channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DataPower Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DataPower Gateway

item.title: CVE-2020-4581|2024-09-17T01:56:28.852Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.12 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a chunked transfer-encoding HTTP/2 request. IBM X-Force ID: 184441.
